shortdesc.ph: Aggregates statistical information of each network path in multipath transmission.

section.p: represents the statistics of multipath transmission, including the number of bytes sent and received over LAN, Wi-Fi, and mobile network paths, the current number of active paths, and detailed statistics for each path.

plentry.pd: Total number of bytes sent through the LAN path.
Total number of bytes sent over the LAN path.
Total number of bytes received over the LAN path.
Total number of video bytes received through the LAN path.
Total number of bytes received through the LAN path.
Total number of bytes sent over Wi-Fi.
Total number of video bytes sent over the Wi-Fi path.
Total number of bytes sent over the Wi-Fi path.
Total bytes received over Wi-Fi.
Total number of video bytes received via the Wi-Fi path.
Total number of bytes received via the Wi-Fi path.
Total bytes sent over mobile data.
Total number of video bytes sent through the mobile network path.
Total number of bytes sent over the mobile network path.
Total bytes received via mobile data.
Total number of video bytes received via the mobile network path.
Total number of bytes received through the mobile network path.
Number of active paths.
The number of currently active paths.
Statistics about each active path. See .
